Desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills charge the air around you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds causing a {c_important}Lightning Strike{/c} to periodically hit an enemy in the area for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage. This duration can be extended by additional Critical Strikes.
Name: Runeworker's Conduit
